thread.section_title: Chrono24 Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Chrono24 | www.chrono24.com
thread.title: Marco Cenzatti

author: Marco Cenzatti
title: Marco Cenzatti
text:
I was concerned about buying from Chrono24 given all the horrible reviews here and elsewhere.
I took the precaution of paying with PayPal and I choose a screened seller: MyChrono GmbH.
The Transaction was fast and with no problem whatsoever. MyChromo GmbH responded immediately to my first email with a clear breakdown of the expenses (cost of watch, shipping, PayPal, German duties) and on the time necessary for custom clearance and actual shipment. Within hours the also responded to following emails. At the end, it took less than they stated. Two days after sending the payment I received the watch.
Bravo!
